programme.title: A Love to Last
programme.desc: Anton tries to dodge Grace's efforts to annul their marriage, but their son Lucas continues to pin the blame on him.

programme.title: A Love to Last
programme.desc: While Andeng bounces back from her heartbreak with her family's help, Anton finally gives in to Grace's request for an annulment.

programme.title: A Love to Last
programme.desc: Through sheer will and determination, Andeng seals the deal with Anton.

programme.title: A Love to Last
programme.desc: An unexpected event cuts short Anton and Andeng's growing closeness.

programme.title: A Love to Last
programme.desc: After the distrastrous event, Andeng transfers to another project.

programme.title: A Love to Last
programme.desc: All hope is lost for Anton when Mr. Hoffman makes a surprising announcement about Celba's future during his party.

programme.title: A Love to Last
programme.desc: Tupe saves Chloe from Red's evil scheme, only to find himself in hot water when his act of goodwill gets misinterpreted.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets
programme.desc: Jane Pineda is a washed-up actress and former child star whose career hits rock bottom while trying to escape a big scandal.

programme.title: Vince & Kath & James
programme.desc: Love can be complicated, especially when Vince agrees to secretly woo Kath on behalf of James, via text, while falling for her as well.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris breaks up with Basti to prioritize providing for her family, particularly Zoe. However, Basti goes to the Philippines, hoping he can still patch things up with Iris.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: While Basti hopes he and Iris can still work things out, Iris decides to end things for good. Meanwhile, Cassandra faces a new test when a client breaks their agreement.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian applies for separation from service after finding out about the truth behind her identity. Tiago, on the other hand, orders Franco to find his adopted daughter after failing to reach her. Unknown to him, Rhian leaves everything behind and chooses to live a simple life with Isabelle and her family.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian's decision to end her service in the military surprises everyone. Despite this, Ethan and his team continue to fish for information about David and his high-profile protectors. Rhian, meanwhile, starts living the quiet life she chose. Unknown to her, Franco has discovered what she is up to.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert decides to bring his family on a vacation to take a break from the stressful case of Romina. Robert then cherishes the moment of seeing his whole family complete and happy. However, he makes a shocking discovery about Daniela. Meanwhile, Cassie and Marga agree to be civil with each other. Later, Tope makes a revelation that catches Marga off-guard.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After confessing her involvement in Romina's assault, Daniela begs Robert not to turn her in to the police. Despite his outrage, Robert chooses to protect his daughter. To make matters worse, Romina discovers Daniela's sworn statement to police and confronts her. Meanwhile, Hector finds out about the Mondragons' plan to move abroad and makes a desperate move.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Thanks to Jenna's meddling, Tristan's transaction with the kidnappers fails. To protect his family, Tristan moves Aryann and Angelo somewhere safer. Meanwhile, Waldo deals with office politics.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: While Tristan struggles with Supreme Pacific's scandal, Chesca's kidnapping, and Angelo's worsening condition, the del Mars rejoice as Waldo fulfills his dream of becoming a full-fledged engineer. Soon, Waldo meets his big boss.
